entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT WEDNESDAY

entry.data:
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 80
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS AROUND 60

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
